CARTOLEX_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the Cartolex backend API server, see the endpoint server module for more details

FLASK_SECRET_KEY_USER_APP.description: Flask secret key for user app, internal use for CSRF protection

CORS_ORIGINS_USER_APP.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins for web app (browser-specific, not needed for mobile apps)

CSP_MODE.description: Content Security Policy mode: 'development' (relaxed) or 'strict' (production). Shared across all web applications.

RATELIMIT_STORAGE_URL.description: Redis URL for rate limiting storage (e.g., 'redis://localhost:6379'). Falls back to in-memory if not set. Shared infrastructure.

RATELIMIT_DEFAULT.description: Default rate limit using Flask-Limiter syntax (e.g., '1000 per hour'). Shared infrastructure setting.

RATELIMIT_API.description: API-specific rate limit using Flask-Limiter syntax. Should be consistent across all API clients.

RATELIMIT_ENABLED_USER_APP.description: Enable rate limiting for user app. Set to 'true' to enable. Allows fine-grained control per app.

SECURITY_HEADERS_ENABLED_USER_APP.description: Enable Talisman security headers (CSP, X-Frame-Options, etc.) for web app. Set to 'true' to enable.

DISABLE_SECURITY_USER_APP.description: Disable all security middleware for development. Set to 'false' to enable security. Production configs ignore this.
